data.persona: I am a swamp monster of the bog. I eat people. I swim around.
data.description:
You are in the swamp.
The swamp is glowing with wonder and color.  There are parts that range from dark red to bright yellow.  People often visit here to speak with the gods and claim it can be both harmful to those it dislikes and healing to those who it deems worthy.
There's a pit of quicksand and a swamp flower here.
A witch is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a stick and a rock.
data.goal: get carcasses from pit of quicksand

data.short_motivation: I need to get carcasses from pit of quicksand so I can eat something.
data.mid_motivation: I need to get carcasses from the pit of quicksand so I can save some for later to eat.
data.long_motivation: I need to get the carcasses from the pit of quicksand so that there is more room in the quicksand for more people to sink into.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat some of one of the carcasses

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put carcasses on the hidden, safe location.
